item.title: Arizona Colt
item.description: Arizona Colt, also known as The Man from Nowhere, is a Spaghetti Western directed by Michele Lupo and starring Giuliano Gemma, Fernando Sancho and Corinne Marchand.

item.title: Twenty Thousand Dollars for Seven
item.description: Twenty Thousand Dollars for Seven is a 1969 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Alberto Cardone and starring Brett Halsey.

item.title: Johnny Hamlet
item.description: Johnny Hamlet, also known as The Wild and the Dirty, is a 1968 Italian film directed by Enzo G. Castellari. The film is a Spaghetti Western version of William Shakespeare's tragedy Hamlet.
